Text: Really poor picture quality, blurry and blocky. It was a good idea to upload this classic but why ruin everything just because you want to keep the filesize as small as possible?

don't know what your trying to watch it on but
one thing for sure not the same monitor i am or you need glasses badly.

and actually i call that rather a large file size for a
mp4 file for a movie under 2 hours
Thank you very much for the upload, love this movie!!

Thought that this file was pretty good quality! I first saw this movie when I was 11 yrs old and thought it fantastic; it's still a lot of fun.  Did'nt think I'd ever see it again...many thanks for making it available.
